span.strong: Fowler Public Schools Continuity of Learning Plan

span.span: School is Closed andAll Activities are Closed through April 30, 2020.

span.strong: MISSION OF THE FOWLER PUBLIC SCHOOLS

br.span: Fowler Public Schools, in partnership with the surrounding community, will work to provide all students and staff with a safe educational environment that focuses on a well-rounded, technology oriented curriculum. Our staff will help create responsible citizens by giving all students the opportunity to develop the skills essential for success in family, life, work, and community.
